Description: Body sherd of Attic black-figured pottery Komast cup; interior glazed black; exterior: black-figure male komast dancing to left (only lower part), wearing short chiton with added red, right foot raised behind him and part of left hand at right of sherd; incised spoked rosette with alternate red petals; below, two black lines.
Curator's comments: For parallels, see the Komast cups by the KY Painter, Paris CP 10235 and CP 10236 (Brijder 1983, pl. 3c, no. K.10 and pl. 3d, no. K.11).
